评论详情: Good quality wallet with money clip love the design and the slimness great gift idea for teenagers and men.

评论概述: Best money-clip I have ever had...
评论详情: My wife liked it so much I bought one for her, also!  I needed a convenient way to carry just a few dollar bills and a couple of credit cards when I didn't need the whole stack of cards in my pocket.  The money clip is exceptionally clever. It expands enough to carry a bunch of one-dollar bills and still works when I have just a few bills.  The cards are easy to see and slip in and out without being loose in my pocket.  I didn't want the coin on the clip, but it adds just the right amount of weight to the whole package.  My wife and I both love it!

I have tried other minimalist clip wallets and they all seem to have the flare at the end of the clip that either digs into your leg or your pants. I honestly thought this looked too simple to be any good but got it just to see.  It immediately became my favorite. Yes, you have top pull all your cards out each time, but let's be honest, I did with the other ones too no matter what gimmick they seemed to have to access cards easier. At least this one is honest, and it is easy to pull them all and get what you need then out them back.  At first I thought the coin clip didn't hold bills strongly, and then I discovered that I wasn't putting them back far enough and that it actually grips them very tightly.  So I ended up loving it. It is light enough and small enough that I often don't notice it is still in my pocket after work, and I used to take my wallet out immediately. I am very pleasantly surprised.  It also comes with a jewelry polishing cloth and something that looks sort of like an emery board in a bag with Chinese writing. Mine did not come with a little metal box like the picture. I didn't care, but you might?

评论概述: Great Money Clip with Classy Design
评论详情: A money clip is a great way to carry your important cards and cash without the bulk of a regular wallet. I love the design of this money clip. It's made of leather with a gold coin style clip. It's supposed to hold up to 6 cards, but I think 4 or 5 is more realistic as it gets very tight with more than that. Overall, this is a very nice money clip with a classy design.

评论概述: swank money clip with card wallet
评论详情: Sharp and stylish. The money clip and wallet are detachable. Minimalist in function. Recommended.

This money clip is truly leather and quite slim and attractive. The leather card holder fits a card very tightly, so tightly that it would be difficult to push in more than 2 or 3 cards. It would be better if the card holder were a little broader.  The clip for bills is very strong, but I don't know how long it will remain tight. However, there are instructions on how to tighten the clip if it becomes less effective. Right now the money clip holds 9 folded US bills and 1 credit card comfortably.  Because the gold clamp is attached to the pouch through the leather, the more bills you clip into it, the less space there is for credit cards. (see interior of holder in 3rd photo.) If you put in, say, 15 folded bills, the interior portion of the clamp bulges and when as you insert a credit card, the card catches on the metal of the clip, making it very unmanageable.  So for a few bills and 1 or 2 credit cards this works well. I like it.
